name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Yesterday Matt Lauer jokingly blamed Bob Costas' eye infection on Russian President Vladimir Putin. Yeah, and today police are wondering: Where in the world is Matt Lauer?

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The Slovenian woman who won the gold medal in alpine skiing is also a pop star in her country. So Justin Bieber is not the only pop star going downhill fast.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: At a McDonald's in Michigan, a woman fired a gun at a drive-through worker for forgetting bacon on her order. In the woman's defense, the worker did forget her bacon.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Researchers say that at least four species of crocodiles are able to climb trees. And there is a cobra that can pick locks.
